author: Gus_263
title: My second racers set
review: This is my second racers set. With a cool car, a cool pilot included in a set with few pieces, if you search for it, it may cost a low price. These racers are excellent for competitions with all of the collection, because when something touches in the front the pilot go out of the car.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Xalax) - Pulse Review
review:
This set is a good set to have. Even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms. It's an easy built and it's also very easy to maneuver this vehicle. We also get a few stickers for the ramp. The only play features we get in this set are the same as in the other LEGO Racers (Xalax) sets: The ramp launches the car and the gray bumper is able to shoot the driver out of the cockpit.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
